name: The Great Phatsby
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Dan Greaney, Matt Selman
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Mr Burns tries to relive his glory days, and crosses paths with a mysterious music mogul.
